title: UWM receives $2.5 million from Kohler Trust for Clean Water for Great Lakes research
text: UWM receives $2.5 million from Kohler Trust for Clean Water for Great Lakes research Source: BizTimes By garychan@uwm.eduMarch 12, 2025 UWM receives $2.5 million from Kohler Trust for Clean Water for Great Lakes research View the full story: BizTimes Latest Lazarus Project to shine a new light on oldest map in UWM collection By David LewellenMarch 10, 2025 Two Peck School alums receive 2025 Nohl Fellowships By Jason McCullumMarch 3, 2025 Employees thankful for colleagues, students and mission By Kari PinkMarch 3, 2025 Married couple navigate grad school, family life and careers By Kathy Quirk February 24, 2025 Popular Lazarus Project to shine a new light on oldest map in UWM collection By David LewellenMarch 10, 2025 UWM is a partner on a project to address rural transportation needs with autonomous vehicles By Laura OttoFebruary 17, 2025 Married couple navigate grad school, family life and careers By Kathy Quirk February 24, 2025 Cupid strikes!
